project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file and counts the frequency of each word, displaying the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement the function to read a text file and count word frequencies
Implement logic to determine the top 10 most common words
Format and display the results in the terminal
Write tests to ensure the word counting and top word identification work correctly
Execute tests on the complete program to verify accuracy and functionality
